name: Run, Don't Walk
description:
Run, Don't Walk is inspired by the classic World 1-1 but with a twist (well, several twists actually).

Collect all the coins as Mario but now with Peach's float ability. Oh, and some helpful items from the original will now kill you 🤷

Run, Don't Walk is an exploration into 2D level design using the 'How Did They Do That' Mario world builder in GameMakerStudio 2 

  • Detailed-level analsis in "Run, Don't Walk -Level Design Document."
  • Developed 1/2020
